row.name: Adaptability
row.description: The Pokemon's STAB modifier becomes 2x.

row.name: Aerilate
row.description: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Flying-type and deals 1.3x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.

row.name: Aftermath
row.description: Deals 25% damage when KOed by contact damage.

row.name: Air Lock
row.description: Blocks the effects of weather.

row.name: Analytic
row.description: Raises the power of all moves by 30% if the wielder moves last.

row.name: Anger Point
row.description: Raises Attack to +6 if struck by a critical hit.

row.name: Anticipation
row.description: Alerts the Pokemon of certain dangerous moves.

row.name: Arena Trap
row.description: Prevents switching and increases wild encounter rate.

row.name: Aroma Veil
row.description: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.

row.name: Aura Break
row.description: Reverses the effects of Dark Aura and Fairy Aura.

row.name: Bad Dreams
row.description: Deals 12.5% damage to sleeping opponents per turn.

row.name: Battle Armor
row.description: Prevents critical hits.

row.name: Big Pecks
row.description: The wielder's Defense cannot be lowered.

row.name: Blaze
row.description: Boosts power of Fire-type moves 50% when at 1/3 of max HP or less.

row.name: Bulletproof
row.description: This Pokemon is protected from some Ball and Bomb moves.

row.name: Cheek Pouch
row.description: Increases HP when this Pokemon consumes a berry.

row.name: Chlorophyll
row.description: Speed doubles in sun.

row.name: Clear Body
row.description: Stops the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's stats.

row.name: Cloud Nine
row.description: Blocks the effects of weather.

row.name: Color Change
row.description: Changes user's type to type of last attack that hit this Pokemon.

row.name: Competitive
row.description: Raises the user's Special Attack stat by two stages when a stat is lowered, including the Special Attack stat. This does not include self-induced stat drops like those from Close Combat.

row.name: Compound Eyes
row.description: Raises accuracy by 30% and increases the probability of wild Pokemon holding items.

row.name: Contrary
row.description: The wielder's stat changes are reversed.

row.name: Cursed Body
row.description: The wielder has a 30% chance to disable any move that hits it.

row.name: Cute Charm
row.description: Can infatuate Pokemon of opposite gender when struck and increases their wild encounter rate.

row.name: Damp
row.description: Prevents the use of Self-Destruct or Explosion.

row.name: Dark Aura
row.description: Increases the power of all Dark-type moves in battle to 1.3x.

row.name: Defeatist
row.description: Halves the wielder's Attack and Special Attack if its HP drops below 50%.

row.name: Defiant
row.description: Boosts Attack by two stages for every stat drop.

row.name: Delta Stream
row.description: Summons Strong Winds until Pokemon leaves battle. Electric/Ice/Rock moves do half damage and Weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Primordial Sea and Desolate Land.

row.name: Desolate Land
row.description: Summons Heavy Sun until Pokemon leaves battle. Water-type moves and weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Primordial Sea and Delta Stream.

row.name: Download
row.description: User gets a stat boost depending on its opponent's stats.

row.name: Drizzle
row.description: Summons rain.

row.name: Drought
row.description: Summons sun.

row.name: Dry Skin
row.description: User absorbs Water-type attacks and has a weakness to Fire-type moves. Heals in rain and is damaged by sun.

row.name: Early Bird
row.description: Reduces sleep time by 50%.

row.name: Effect Spore
row.description: Induces paralysis, poison, or sleep on contact.

row.name: Fairy Aura
row.description: Increases the power of all Fairy-type moves in battle to 1.3x.

row.name: Filter
row.description: Reduces damage from super effective hits by 1/4.

row.name: Flame Body
row.description: Enemies' contact moves have a 30% chance to burn them. Halves the amount of steps required to hatch Eggs.

row.name: Flare Boost
row.description: Special Attack is increased by 50% when burned.

row.name: Flash Fire
row.description: Grants immunity to Fire and increases Fire's power 50% when hit by a Fire move.

row.name: Flower Gift
row.description: Raises Attack and Special Defense of this Pokemon and its partners in sun.

row.name: Flower Veil
row.description: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokemon's stats.

row.name: Forecast
row.description: Changes type according to weather.

row.name: Forewarn
row.description: Tells which of the opponent's moves has the highest Base Power.

row.name: Friend Guard
row.description: Reduces damage done to a teammate by 25%.

row.name: Frisk
row.description: Reveals the foe's items.

row.name: Fur Coat
row.description: Halves the damage done to this Pokemon by physical attacks.

row.name: Gale Wings
row.description: This Pokemon's Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.

row.name: Gluttony
row.description: Consumes pinch Berries at 50% HP or less.

row.name: Gooey
row.description: Contact with this Pokemon decreases the attacker's Speed by 1 stage.

row.name: Grass Pelt
row.description: This Pokemon's Defense is boosted by 50% in Grassy Terrain

row.name: Guts
row.description: Attack is increased 50% when afflicted by a non-volatile status.

row.name: Harvest
row.description: After each turn, the wielder may receive the Berry it used at a 50% chance (100% if in sun).

row.name: Healer
row.description: 30% chance to heal an adjacent teammate of a status condition every turn.

row.name: Heatproof
row.description: Reduces Fire damage 50%.

row.name: Heavy Metal
row.description: The wielder's weight is doubled.

row.name: Honey Gather
row.description: Adds a chance of finding Honey after each in-game battle.

row.name: Huge Power
row.description: Doubles Attack.

row.name: Hustle
row.description: Physical moves do 50% more damage at the cost of 20% accuracy. Increases wild encounter rate with higher level Pokemon.

row.name: Hydration
row.description: Heals status effects in rain.

row.name: Hyper Cutter
row.description: Prevents the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's Attack. Increases Cut's area of effect.

row.name: Ice Body
row.description: Heals 1/16 of max HP in hail.

row.name: Illuminate
row.description: Increases wild encounter rate (no effect in battles).

row.name: Illusion
row.description: The wielder appears as the last Pokemon in the party to the opponent.

row.name: Immunity
row.description: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned.

row.name: Imposter
row.description: The wielder transforms into the opponent when it switches in.

row.name: Infiltrator
row.description: The wielder bypasses the foe's Light Screen, Reflect, Mist, Safeguard, and Substitute.

row.name: Inner Focus
row.description: Prevents flinching.

row.name: Insomnia
row.description: Prevents sleep.

row.name: Intimidate
row.description: Lowers the foe's Attack by 1 stage. Decreases wild encounter rate.

row.name: Iron Barbs
row.description: Deals 1/8 recoil damage when the opponent makes contact.

row.name: Iron Fist
row.description: Increases the power of punching moves by 20%.

row.name: Justified
row.description: Raises Attack by one stage when hit by a Dark-type move.

row.name: Keen Eye
row.description: Pokemon's accuracy cannot be lowered. Opponent's evasion boosts are ignored. Decreases wild encounter rate.

row.name: Klutz
row.description: This Pokemon both is unaffected by and will not utilize held items.

row.name: Leaf Guard
row.description: Prevents status effects in sun.

row.name: Levitate
row.description: This Pokemon is immune to Ground-type moves.

row.name: Light Metal
row.description: The wielder's weight is halved.

row.name: Lightningrod
row.description: All Electric-type attacks target this Pokemon. Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by an Electric-type move.

row.name: Limber
row.description: Blocks paralysis.

row.name: Liquid Ooze
row.description: Leeching moves cause the enemy to lose HP instead.

row.name: Magic Bounce
row.description: Bounces back certain non-damaging moves.

row.name: Magic Guard
row.description: Prevents indirect damage.

row.name: Magician
row.description: If this Pokemon is not holding an item, it steals the held item of a target it hits with a move.

row.name: Magma Armor
row.description: Cannot be frozen. Halves the amount of steps required to hatch Eggs.

row.name: Magnet Pull
row.description: Prevents Steel-type Pokemon from switching. Increases the chance of encountering a Steel-type Pokemon in the wild.

row.name: Marvel Scale
row.description: Boosts Defense 50% when afflicted by a non-volatile status.

row.name: Mega Launcher
row.description: Boosts the power of Aura and Pulse moves, such as Aura Sphere and Dark Pulse, by 50%.

row.name: Minus
row.description: If allied with a Pokemon with Plus or Minus, its Special Attack increases by 50%.

row.name: Mold Breaker
row.description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

row.name: Moody
row.description: A random stat is lowered by 1 stage and another is boosted by 2 stages every turn.

row.name: Motor Drive
row.description: Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Speed by 1 stage when hit by a Electric-type move.

row.name: Moxie
row.description: Boosts Attack by 1 stage if the wielder knocks out another Pokemon.

row.name: Multiscale
row.description: Reduces damage by 50% if the wielder is at full health.

row.name: Multitype
row.description: Type changes depending on the held plate. Prevents item loss.

row.name: Mummy
row.description: The opponent's ability becomes Mummy when it hits the wielder with a contact move.

row.name: Natural Cure
row.description: Cures status on switching out.

row.name: No Guard
row.description: All attacks used by and used on this Pokemon will never miss.

row.name: Normalize
row.description: All moves used by this Pokemon become Normal-type.

row.name: Oblivious
row.description: Grants immunity to infatuation, Captivate, and Taunt.

row.name: Overcoat
row.description: Grants immunity to damage from weather effects and powder moves.

row.name: Overgrow
row.description: Raises the power of Grass-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

row.name: Own Tempo
row.description: Cannot be confused.

row.name: Parental Bond
row.description: Allows the Pokemon to hit twice with the same move in one turn. Second hit has 0.5x base power. Does not affect Status, multihit, self-KO, or spread moves (in doubles).

row.name: Pickpocket
row.description: The wielder immediately steals an item from an attacker using a contact move.

row.name: Pickup
row.description: If the wielder has no held item, it gets the last item consumed at the end of the turn. Adds a chance of finding an item after each battle.

row.name: Pixilate
row.description: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Fairy-type and deals 1.3x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.

row.name: Plus
row.description: If allied with a Pokemon with Plus or Minus, its Special Attack increases by 50%.

row.name: Poison Heal
row.description: Heals 1/8 of max HP per turn when poisoned.

row.name: Poison Point
row.description: Enemies' contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning them.

row.name: Poison Touch
row.description: The wielder's contact moves gain a 30% chance to poison the opponent.

row.name: Prankster
row.description: Non-damaging moves have their priority increased by one level.

row.name: Pressure
row.description: Enemy attacks lose 1 extra PP. Increases wild encounter rate.

row.name: Primordial Sea
row.description: Summons Heavy Rain until Pokemon leaves battle. Fire-type moves and weather changing moves/abilities fail, except for Desolate Land and Delta Stream.

row.name: Protean
row.description: Right before this Pokemon uses a move, it changes its type to match that move. Hidden Power is interpreted as its Hidden Power type, rather than Normal.

row.name: Pure Power
row.description: Doubles Attack.

row.name: Quick Feet
row.description: Increases Speed by 50% when afflicted with a status condition.

row.name: Rain Dish
row.description: Heals 1/16 of max HP in rain.

row.name: Rattled
row.description: Raises Speed one stage when hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type move.

row.name: Reckless
row.description: Increases the power of recoil moves by 20%.

row.name: Refrigerate
row.description: Turns all of this Pokemon's Normal-typed attacks into Ice-typed and deal 1.3x damage. Does not affect Hidden Power.

row.name: Regenerator
row.description: Wielder heals 1/3 of its maximum HP on switching out.

row.name: Rivalry
row.description: Raises move power by 25% if the opponent has the same gender, and reduces by 25% if the opponent has the opposite gender. Genderless Pokemon do not affect this ability.

row.name: Rock Head
row.description: Negates recoil from recoil moves.

row.name: Rough Skin
row.description: Deals 1/8 recoil damage when the opponent makes contact.

row.name: Run Away
row.description: Increases the chance of successfully escaping battle with a wild Pokemon.

row.name: Sand Force
row.description: Increases power of Ground-, Rock-, and Steel-type attacks by 30% in a sandstorm.

row.name: Sand Rush
row.description: Speed doubles in sandstorm.

row.name: Sand Stream
row.description: Summons sandstorm.

row.name: Sand Veil
row.description: Evasion increases by 20% in a sandstorm.

row.name: Sap Sipper
row.description: Grants immunity to Grass-type moves and boosts Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Grass-type move.

row.name: Scrappy
row.description: Can hit Ghost-types with Fighting- and Normal-type moves.

row.name: Serene Grace
row.description: This Pokemon's secondary effect chances are doubled.

row.name: Shadow Tag
row.description: Traps opponents. Does not affect Pokemon with Shadow Tag.

row.name: Shed Skin
row.description: 30% chance to heal status.

row.name: Sheer Force
row.description: Increases power of moves with secondary effects by 30%, but removes the effects.

row.name: Shell Armor
row.description: Prevents critical hits.

row.name: Shield Dust
row.description: Secondary effects won't occur.

row.name: Simple
row.description: Doubles the effect of stat boosts and drops.

row.name: Skill Link
row.description: Multi-hit moves will always hit the maximum number of times.

row.name: Slow Start
row.description: Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.

row.name: Sniper
row.description: Critical hits do 2.25x damage instead of 1.5x.

row.name: Snow Cloak
row.description: Evasion increases by 20% in hail.

row.name: Snow Warning
row.description: Summons hail.

row.name: Solar Power
row.description: Loses 10% HP in sun each turn. Special Attack increases by 50%.

row.name: Solid Rock
row.description: Reduces damage from super effective hits by 1/4.

row.name: Soundproof
row.description: Unaffected by sound moves.

row.name: Speed Boost
row.description: Speed raises at end of turn.

row.name: Stall
row.description: This Pokemon moves last.

row.name: Stance Change
row.description: Only affects Aegislash. If this Pokemon uses a Physical or Special move, it changes to Blade forme. If this Pokemon uses King's Shield, it changes to Shield forme.

row.name: Static
row.description: Enemies' contact moves can paralyze them.

row.name: Steadfast
row.description: Speed is boosted one stage when flinched.

row.name: Stench
row.description: Adds a 10% flinch chance for moves that do not have one. Decreases wild encounter rate.

row.name: Sticky Hold
row.description: This Pokemon's item cannot be removed. Increases the chance of encountering Pokemon while fishing.

row.name: Storm Drain
row.description: All Water-type attacks target this Pokemon. Grants immunity to Water-type moves and boosts Special Attack by 1 stage when hit by a Water-type move.

row.name: Strong Jaw
row.description: This Pokemon receives a 50% power boost for jaw attacks such as Bite and Crunch.

row.name: Sturdy
row.description: The wielder cannot be KO'd in one hit. OHKO moves will fail.

row.name: Suction Cups
row.description: Cannot be forced to switch. Increases chance of encountering Pokemon while fishing.

row.name: Super Luck
row.description: Critical hit rate increases one stage.

row.name: Swarm
row.description: Boosts power of Bug-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

row.name: Sweet Veil
row.description: Prevents allies from being put to Sleep.

row.name: Swift Swim
row.description: Speed doubles in rain.

row.name: Symbiosis
row.description: This Pokemon immediately passes its item to an ally after their item is consumed.

row.name: Synchronize
row.description: When statused, the enemy is also statused. Can pass nature to wild Pokemon.

row.name: Tangled Feet
row.description: Evasion increases when confused.

row.name: Technician
row.description: Increases power of moves with 60 base power or less by 50%.

row.name: Telepathy
row.description: Does not take damage from allies' attacks.

row.name: Teravolt
row.description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

row.name: Thick Fat
row.description: Halves Ice- and Fire-type damage.

row.name: Tinted Lens
row.description: Doubles damage on resisted hits.

row.name: Torrent
row.description: Boosts power of Water-type moves by 50% when at 1/3 HP or less.

row.name: Tough Claws
row.description: This Pokemon's contact attacks do 1.33x damage.

row.name: Toxic Boost
row.description: Attack is increased by 50% when poisoned.

row.name: Trace
row.description: Copies foe's ability.

row.name: Truant
row.description: This Pokemon does nothing every other turn.

row.name: Turboblaze
row.description: Abilities that hinder attacks are nullified.

row.name: Unaware
row.description: Ignores stat boosts and debuffs on other Pokemon.

row.name: Unburden
row.description: Speed increases when an item is used or lost.

row.name: Unnerve
row.description: Prevents the foe from consuming its held Berry item.

row.name: Victory Star
row.description: Increases the accuracy of the wielder and allies on its side of the field by 10%.

row.name: Vital Spirit
row.description: Prevents sleep. Increases wild encounters with higher level Pokemon.

row.name: Volt Absorb
row.description: Heals 25% HP when hit by an Electric-type attack.

row.name: Water Absorb
row.description: Heals 25% HP when hit by a Water-type attack.

row.name: Water Veil
row.description: Prevents burn.

row.name: Weak Armor
row.description: Boosts Speed by 1 stage and lowers Defense by 1 stage when hit by a Physical move.

row.name: White Smoke
row.description: Prevents the enemy from lowering this Pokemon's stats and decreases wild encounter rate.

row.name: Wonder Guard
row.description: Only super effective attacks harm this Pokemon.

row.name: Wonder Skin
row.description: Reduces the accuracy of a status move to 50%.

row.name: Zen Mode
row.description: The wielder changes forme when below 50% of its max HP.
